means: 晕倒，昏倒( faint的现在分词 )

word_mean: 又称“晕厥”。突然昏倒，不省人事，四肢厥冷，移时苏醒，醒后无失语偏瘫等后遗症的表现。

sentence.Network_en: Machinery slackened; throbbing feebly like a fainting pulse; stopped.
sentence.Network_cn: 机器慢下来了; 震动得象微弱的脉搏那样无力; 最后停止了.

sentence.Network_en: I was dizzy and close to fainting.
sentence.Network_cn: 我头晕眼花,差一点晕倒.

sentence.Network_en: Fainting is common after injections and vaccinations, especially in adolescents.
sentence.Network_cn: 在注射和接种疫苗后,昏厥是常见的, 尤其是在青少年.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Helping the helpless , cheering fainting , Seeking the wandering sinner to find ., 帮助孤苦者 , 鼓励灰心者 , 领人归基督 , 寻找亡羊.
She was fainting with hunger ., 她因饥饿逐渐衰弱.
did you have dizziness , vertigo or fainting ., 你有过眼花 , 头晕和晕厥吗.
The girl reporter obliged Hearst by " fainting " in the main street ., 那位女记者在大街上 " 昏厥过去 " , 帮了赫斯特一个大忙.

list.abs: 大学英语三级考试常考词组和固定搭配 - 豆丁网 ... so dim (大脑)浑沌 so faint 晕过去 be subjected to 遭受.
failure-safe system 故障自动排除系统faint negative 浅底片faint 微弱的
加拿大... ... Mental disorders 精神病 Fainting spells,fitsor seizures 突发性眩晕，痉挛或癫痫 Chronic skin condition 皮肤病.
钻石戒指：钻戒等级... ... (COLORLESS) 无色，以D为最优， (FAINT YELLOW) 稍微带有黄色， (NEAR COLORLESS) 接近无色。 …

entry.tran: (声音、颜色、标记、感觉或特性)微弱的，暗淡的，虚弱的
entry.def: A faint sound, colour, mark, feeling, or quality has very little strength or intensity.

example.ex: He became aware of the soft, faint sounds of water dripping...
example.tran: 他开始注意到轻微的水滴声。

example.ex: The room held the faint, sweet odour of pipe tobacco...
example.tran: 房间内有烟斗烟丝的淡淡馨香。

entry.tran: 不尽力的;敷衍的;半心半意的
entry.def: A faint attempt at something is one that is made without proper effort and with little enthusiasm.

example.ex: Caroline made a faint attempt at a laugh...
example.tran: 卡罗琳敷衍地笑了一下。

example.ex: A faint smile crossed the Monsignor's face and faded quickly...
example.tran: 一丝敷衍的微笑从那位大人脸上掠过，很快就消失了。

entry.def: If you faint, you lose consciousness for a short time, especially because you are hungry, or because of pain, heat, or shock.

example.ex: She suddenly fell forward on to the table and fainted...
example.tran: 她突然向前栽倒在桌上，晕了过去。

example.ex: I thought he'd faint when I kissed him.
example.tran: 我以为吻他的时候他会晕倒呢。

entry.def: Someone who is faint feels weak and unsteady as if they are about to lose consciousness.

example.ex: Other signs of angina are nausea, sweating, feeling faint and shortness of breath.
example.tran: 心绞痛的其他征兆有恶心、出汗、头昏和气短。

auth_sentence.content: Repeated episodes of fainting should also be investigated further.
auth_sentence.res_content: Repeated episodes of fainting should also be investigated further.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Repeated episodes of fainting should also be investigated further.

auth_sentence.content: Ladies were carried, fainting, from the theatre.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ladies were carried, fainting, from the theatre.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ladies were carried, fainting, from the theatre.

auth_sentence.content: Fainting - or feeling faint - is also common in pregnancy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fainting - or feeling faint - is also common in pregnancy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fainting - or feeling faint - is also common in pregnancy.
